Yet <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against his <S%H113>lord<s%>.

And <S%H430><s%>, behold, God is with us at our <S%H7218>head<s%>, and his <S%H3548>priests<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H7321>alarm<s%> to sound an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> against <S%H1121>you<s%>. But <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> caused an <S%H3993>ambushment<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H6440>them<s%>: so they were before <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H3993>ambushment<s%> was behind <S%H310>them<s%>.

And when <S%H3063>Judah<s%> looked <S%H6437>back<s%>, <S%H4421>behold<s%>, the battle was <S%H6440>before<s%> and <S%H268>behind<s%> <S%H6817>them<s%>; and they cried unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounded<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>.

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> gave a <S%H7321>shout<s%>: and as the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%>, it came to <S%H430>pass<s%>, that God <S%H5062>smote<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H29>Abijah<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H29>Abijah<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>: so there fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3665>brought<s%> under at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H553>prevailed<s%>, because they <S%H8172>relied<s%> upon <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H29>Abijah<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> from <S%H1008>him<s%>, Beth-el with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H3466>thereof<s%>, and Jeshanah with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H6085>thereof<s%>, and Ephron with the towns <S%H1323>thereof<s%>.
